titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Newborn Hearing Audiology Test - Description

body.p: A Newborn Hearing Audiology Test is a Clinical Investigation .
A Newborn Hearing Audiology Test is a test carried out on a baby when the initial Newborn Hearing Screening does not show a clear response from one or both ears.
The Newborn Hearing Audiology Test is carried out at a specialist audiology clinic.
